alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL SUFFOLK COUNTY THROUGH 815 PM EDT... At 729 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mastic Beach to 13 miles southeast of East Hampton. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Riverhead, Shirley, Manorville, Wading River, Center Moriches, Mattituck, Southampton, Westhampton, Sag Harbor, Bridgehampton, Mastic, Mastic Beach, Calverton, Yaphank, and Noyack. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk
